results.title: WHY YOU SHOULDN'T BUY THE FURNITURE SET

Don't be intimidated- they are all pretty user friendly!

results.content: Storage and playfulness are key components in any room. Hear what else Studio McGee recommends for designing spaces for your little ones.

results.title: DESIGNER TRICK : EXAMINE A ROOM IN 2D
results.content: We love this tip! If you get stuck styling your room, take a photo and examine the photo, rather than staring at your room. It's amazing what you'll notice that needs to be changed!

results.title: HOW TO STYLE YOUR THROW PILLOWS
results.content: People often call lighting the jewelry of a room, but we think pillows are! They are like choosing earrings. Are you going bold to make a statement, or small and quiet to let everything else shine? Styling them just so makes a big difference!

results.title: UNDERSTANDING FABRIC
results.content: Get schooled in what common fabric types are and how they'll hold up in your space.

results.title: INTERIOR DESIGNERS REVEAL 12 WAYS TO MAKE YOUR HOME LOOK BETTER WITHOUT BUYING ANYTHING
results.content: This is a good read in that it hits on some extremely easy things you can do in your home that will make a big impact towards creating an elevated space. Things like decluttering, hiding cords and rearranging are all the first things a designer will tell you to consider.
